relevant_findings: Frothy, unformed stools like cappuccino mousse
Complete blood counts revealed normal serum total protein and albumin
Negative sweat test for cystic fibrosis
changes_over_time: At 12 months, positive reaction to commercial peanut extract with a wheal of 15 mm and a prominent lymphangitic reaction
Eosinophil count returned to normal on a peanut-free diet (0.3 ·10^9/l)
Initially negative reactions to milk and soya, with later reintroduction of these without reactions
